Text: Re R R graphs in LaTeX documents Cc PST On Thu Feb Robert Lundqvist wrote I have tried to find a neat way to include graphs from R in LaTeX documents but have not succeeded I work with a WinEdtMikTeX combination I use LyX GUI frontend for LaTeX under linux For me I just save from R a postscript file then in Lyx click Insert Figure and stick it in So Its pretty automatic for me and have never had problems over years of use LyX wwwlyxorg runs under windows Bill rhelp mailing list Read hornikRRFAQhtml Send info help or unsubscribe in the body not the subject To
